content: It looks like Josh published a connectathon track for the January connectathon with scenarios for an open, Group export, an open Patients export and Backend Services.
What servers are planning on participating at this track?
@Karl M. Davis I think you'd mentioned in Sept that you might be bringing a server to the January track. Can you confirm/deny?
We might have a server by then
We'll participate for sure with our client

I definitely did mention that!

Just reached out to the team today to see if it was still true. ;-)
Hi @Karl M. Davis , @Ryan Nagle - just wanted to ping you so see if this was still true.
